resources.string: Thank you. You have completed the session
No internet connectivity. Please check your network connection.
This participant has no tests available.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Sign in with your credentials to login

A. Prepare your thumbs at the bottom of the screen over the 'Start Session' button holding your phone in both hands.
 B. Click the ‘Start Session’ button to begin.
 C. During the program, you briefly see a plus (+) sign on screen, followed by a pair of words and finally either the letter \‘E\’ or \‘F\’. When the letter ‘\E\’ appears, tap on the E (left) button. When the letter ‘\F\’ appears, tap on the F (right) button.
 D. After you tapped either the letter E or F, a plus sign (+) comes up again indicating that a new word pair is about to appear.
 E. During the course of the session, keep your attention focused on the words that appears at the top of the screen and hit either E or F with your thumbs to move to next word pair.
 F. There are 240 word pairs to go through; it takes between 8-10 min to go through the session.


Work as accurately and as quickly as you can. Remember to tap on the response areas during the entire program. If you tap outside the response area, the program will not register your response.

A. Keep your index finger active.
 B. Click the 'Start Session' button to begin.
 C. During the program, you briefly see a plus (+) sign on screen, followed by a sentence then a word will appear. Please select if this word is 'unrelated' or 'related'.
 D. After you selected either 'unrelated' or 'related' a plus sign (+) comes up again indicating that a new sentence is about to appear.
 E. During the course of the program, keep your attention focused on the screen
 F. Work as accurately and as quickly as you can. Remember to keep selecting 'unrelated' or 'related' during the entire program. If you don't the program will not register your response.

A. Prepare your thumbs at the bottom of the screen over the 'Start Session' button holding your phone in upright (portrait position) in both hands.
 B. Click the 'Start Session' button to begin.
 C. During the program, you briefly see a plus (+) sign on screen, followed by a pair of photos and finally either the letter 'E' or 'F'. When the letter 'E' appears, tap on the E (left) button. When the letter 'F' appears, tap on the F (right) button.
 D. After you clicked on 'E' using the left mouse button or 'F' using the right mouse button a plus sign (+) comes up again indicating that a pair of photos is about to appear.
 E. During the course of the session, keep your attention focused on the screen.
 F. There are 160 photo pairs to go through; it takes between 8-10 min to go through the session.
 
 Work as accurately and as quickly as you can. Remember to tap on the response areas during the entire program. If you tap outside the response area, the program will not register your response.
